General.Name: va-Q-tec AG
General.Description: va-Q-tec AG develops, produces, and markets vacuum insulation panels and phase change materials in Germany, rest of European Union, and internationally. It also manufactures and distributes thermal packaging solutions and thermal energy storage components. In addition, the company supplies temperature controlled supply chain systems for healthcare and logistics companies; insulation of refrigeration/freezing equipment and ultra-low to appliance and food companies; insulating water boilers, pipelines, and laboratory equipment for technics and industry; building insulation solutions for facades, roofs, and floors; and insulation in refrigeration trucks, electric cars, trains, and aircraft. Further, it offers container rental and thermal consulting services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Würzburg, Germany.
